channel.title: Terminology on Druid Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Terminology on Druid Online Help

item.title: Device setting
item.description: This section gives the explanation to the setting items on the device setting page. Setting mode Real time mode Interval of GPS collecting, environment data collecting and behavior data collecting is 10 minutes. Interval of data transmission is 1 day. You cannot change the interval in this mode. Standard mode STD mode is the default setting of DEBUT devices. Interval of GPS collecting and environment data collecting is 4 hours. Interval of behavior data collecting is 10 minutes.
